addCustomSources.description: Upload one or more files as custom sources for training

props.name: files
props.description: One or more files to upload (PDF, Word, Text, Markdown, HTML, Excel, CSV, PowerPoint, PNG, JPEG, GIF)

askQuestions.description: Query your Chat Aid knowledge base and receive AI-generated answers with source citations

props.name: prompt
props.description: The question to ask the knowledge base

props.name: parentTs
props.description: Optional Unix timestamp for conversation threading. Use the same value for related questions in a conversation.

props.name: messageTs
props.description: Optional Unix timestamp of current message. Use with parentTs for follow-up questions in a conversation.

getCustomSourceById.description: Retrieve single source details by ID

props.name: sourceId
props.description: The ID of the custom source to retrieve
